content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":259312,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　母親達は事前に相談しているので知っています","translatedEnglishLine":"The mothers know because they consulted in advance."},{"lineNumber":259313,"originalJapaneseLine":"翔竜山を登っている途中。","translatedEnglishLine":"On the way up Mount Shoryu."},{"lineNumber":259314,"originalJapaneseLine":"レリコフかスシヌが（両方でもいい）実は自分は作戦について詳しく聞いてないと","translatedEnglishLine":"Lerikoff or Sushinu (either is fine) actually says they haven't heard the details of the plan."},{"lineNumber":259315,"originalJapaneseLine":"という訳で説明する事になる","translatedEnglishLine":"So it comes down to explaining it."},{"lineNumber":259316,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":259317,"originalJapaneseLine":"自分達の目標は　魔王　を倒す事。","translatedEnglishLine":"Our goal is to defeat the Demon King."},{"lineNumber":259318,"originalJapaneseLine":"・そろそろ魔王化が進み危ない","translatedEnglishLine":"- His transformation into the Demon King is progressing and it's dangerous."},{"lineNumber":259319,"originalJapaneseLine":"・過去、２度リセットのビンタで止めた","translatedEnglishLine":"- In the past, we stopped him twice with Reset's slap."},{"lineNumber":259320,"originalJapaneseLine":"・が、今は警戒されてリセットが魔王ランスに近づけない","translatedEnglishLine":"- But now he is wary and Reset cannot get close to Demon King Rance."},{"lineNumber":259321,"originalJapaneseLine":"・通常の戦力では魔王ランスに近づけない","translatedEnglishLine":"- With normal forces, no one can approach Demon King Rance."},{"lineNumber":259322,"originalJapaneseLine":"・ランスの子、成長した人類最強の我々のみが可能","translatedEnglishLine":"- Only us, the children of Rance, the strongest humans grown up, can do it."},{"lineNumber":259323,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　すでに何度もしている説明だが、ユーザーにも再度理解してもらう為に行う","translatedEnglishLine":"Though this explanation has been given many times, we do it again so the player can understand."},{"lineNumber":259324,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　シンプルに要点だけでいいです","translatedEnglishLine":"Keep it simple and just focus on the main points."},{"lineNumber":259325,"originalJapaneseLine":"リセット、みんなお願い。私がランスにさえ近づく事が出来たら","translatedEnglishLine":"Reset, everyone please. If I can just get close to Rance..."},{"lineNumber":259326,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＩＦ深根、いいえ、私がお父様に抱かれる事が出来れば・・","translatedEnglishLine":"IF Fukane: No, if I can be embraced by Father..."},{"lineNumber":259327,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスの心を取り戻し、魔王化を抑えるのが目的","translatedEnglishLine":"The goal is to recover Rance's heart and suppress his transformation into the Demon King."},{"lineNumber":259328,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":259329,"originalJapaneseLine":"ザンス、いや、俺は魔王ランスを殺す。息の根を止める","translatedEnglishLine":"Zansu: No, I will kill Demon King Rance. End his life."},{"lineNumber":259330,"originalJapaneseLine":"そんな方法ではまた数年で同じ状況だからな、殺すしかない","translatedEnglishLine":"That way, after a few years, it'll be the same situation again. There's no choice but to kill him."},{"lineNumber":259331,"originalJapaneseLine":"私達のお父さんよ、いや、それ以前にさすがにそれは無理だわ","translatedEnglishLine":"He's our father, you know. No, even before that, that's impossible."},{"lineNumber":259332,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔王に近づく戦いに持ち込むだけでせいいっぱい、倒すなんて・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Just bringing the fight close to the Demon King is all we can manage; defeating him is... impossible."},{"lineNumber":259333,"originalJapaneseLine":"いや、出来る。俺達はそれだけ強い","translatedEnglishLine":"No, we can. We are that strong."},{"lineNumber":259334,"originalJapaneseLine":"　※ランスを元に戻す、または、殺す事も考えるのは","translatedEnglishLine":"* Considering whether to restore Rance or kill him..."},{"lineNumber":259335,"originalJapaneseLine":"　※子供達の性格によって違うので、それに合わせて書いて下さい","translatedEnglishLine":"* Depends on the personality of the children, so please write accordingly."},{"lineNumber":259336,"originalJapaneseLine":"　※ある程度、意見が割れている様子","translatedEnglishLine":"* Opinions seem somewhat divided."},{"lineNumber":259337,"originalJapaneseLine":"　※　　子供達の気持ちが一致団結してない状況を見せます","translatedEnglishLine":"* Showing a situation where the children's feelings are not unified."},{"lineNumber":259338,"originalJapaneseLine":"翔竜山の門","translatedEnglishLine":"The gate of Mount Shoryu."},{"lineNumber":259339,"originalJapaneseLine":"また門の所に到着します。","translatedEnglishLine":"We arrive once again at the gate."},{"lineNumber":259340,"originalJapaneseLine":"前回は、ここに来たが門を開ける事が出来なかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Last time, we came here but could not open the gate."},{"lineNumber":259341,"originalJapaneseLine":"だが、今回は違う","translatedEnglishLine":"However, this time is different."},{"lineNumber":259342,"originalJapaneseLine":"　リーザスで手に入れた火のオーブ","translatedEnglishLine":"The fire orb obtained in Lisas."},{"lineNumber":259343,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ヘルマンで手に入れた水のオーブ","translatedEnglishLine":"The water orb obtained in Hellman."},{"lineNumber":259344,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ゼスで手に入れた土のオーブ","translatedEnglishLine":"The earth orb obtained in Zeth."},{"lineNumber":259345,"originalJapaneseLine":"　自由都市で手に入れた木のオーブ","translatedEnglishLine":"The wood orb obtained in the Free City."},{"lineNumber":259346,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ＪＡＰＡＮで手に入れた金のオーブ","translatedEnglishLine":"The gold orb obtained in JAPAN."},{"lineNumber":259347,"originalJapaneseLine":"長い冒険を経て５つのオーブを集めた","translatedEnglishLine":"After a long adventure, we gathered five orbs."},{"lineNumber":259348,"originalJapaneseLine":"これを・・と　門のそばのそれっぽい場所に設置","translatedEnglishLine":"Placing them... at an appropriate place near the gate."},{"lineNumber":259349,"originalJapaneseLine":"何か音か声か、変化が発生し・・ふわふわと門が消えていった","translatedEnglishLine":"Some sound or voice occurred... and the gate gently vanished."},{"lineNumber":259350,"originalJapaneseLine":"おおおお・・すごい","translatedEnglishLine":"Ohhh... amazing."},{"lineNumber":259351,"originalJapaneseLine":"自分達は、ここまでやってきたのだ、そして試練をクリアした","translatedEnglishLine":"We have come this far, and cleared the trial."},{"lineNumber":259352,"originalJapaneseLine":"達成感があり、みんな喜んでいます","translatedEnglishLine":"There is a sense of accomplishment and everyone is happy."},{"lineNumber":259353,"originalJapaneseLine":"翔竜山を登っていると、臭い匂いがしてくる　腐臭・・","translatedEnglishLine":"While climbing Mount Shoryu, a foul odor approaches — the stench of rot..."},{"lineNumber":259354,"originalJapaneseLine":"ふわふわと現れたのは、勇者ゲイマルク。","translatedEnglishLine":"Floating into view is the hero, Geimark."},{"lineNumber":259355,"originalJapaneseLine":"　前回、ゲイマルクと合っているは、エール、ドッスワッス、長田、ロッキー","translatedEnglishLine":"Last time, those who met Geimark were Aile, Dosswass, Nagata, and Rocky."},{"lineNumber":259356,"originalJapaneseLine":"　だけなので、ほとんどの人は初見です。","translatedEnglishLine":"So most people are seeing him for the first time."},{"lineNumber":259357,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ただ、噂としては聞いています。","translatedEnglishLine":"However, they've heard rumors about him."},{"lineNumber":259358,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":259359,"originalJapaneseLine":"ザンス「あれが死に損ない勇者か、いつまでも勇者の座にしがみつきやがって","translatedEnglishLine":"Zansu: \"Is that the half-dead hero? Clinging to his title as hero forever.\""},{"lineNumber":259360,"originalJapaneseLine":"　本来なら俺がさっさと次の勇者になって魔王と対決出来たはずなのに」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Originally, I should've become the next hero quickly and faced the Demon King.\""},{"lineNumber":259361,"originalJapaneseLine":"とか勝手な事をほざかせてもいいかな","translatedEnglishLine":"Maybe I could let him blurt out such selfish things."},{"lineNumber":259362,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":259363,"originalJapaneseLine":"勇者ゲイマルクは、ふらふらしている","translatedEnglishLine":"Hero Geimark is staggering."},{"lineNumber":259364,"originalJapaneseLine":"半径数メートル以内に近づくと襲ってくるそうだが、近づかずに少し遠回りして進むと","translatedEnglishLine":"They say if you come within a few meters radius he attacks, but if you keep distance and take a detour,"},{"lineNumber":259365,"originalJapaneseLine":"問題ない、離れていこうと　するが","translatedEnglishLine":"there's no problem. We try to leave."},{"lineNumber":259366,"originalJapaneseLine":"あれも倒しておこうと誰かが言う","translatedEnglishLine":"But someone says let's take him down too."},{"lineNumber":259367,"originalJapaneseLine":"これから魔王と戦うんだ、腐った勇者も倒せるさ","translatedEnglishLine":"We're about to fight the Demon King; we can surely take down a rotten hero as well."},{"lineNumber":259368,"originalJapaneseLine":"エールがそれに賛成するか反対するかは選択肢で","translatedEnglishLine":"Whether Aile agrees or disagrees is a choice."},{"lineNumber":259369,"originalJapaneseLine":"が、どっちにしろ戦う事になる流れで","translatedEnglishLine":"But either way, it leads to a fight."},{"lineNumber":259370,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞戦闘","translatedEnglishLine":"[Battle]"},{"lineNumber":259371,"originalJapaneseLine":"粉々した霧のように消滅させた","translatedEnglishLine":"He was smashed to pieces and vanished like mist."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 母親達は事前に相談しているので知っています
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The mothers know because they consulted in advance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 翔竜山を登っている途中。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the way up Mount Shoryu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レリコフかスシヌが（両方でもいい）実は自分は作戦について詳しく聞いてないと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lerikoff or Sushinu (either is fine) actually says they haven't heard the details of the plan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: という訳で説明する事になる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So it comes down to explaining it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分達の目標は　魔王　を倒す事。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Our goal is to defeat the Demon King.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・そろそろ魔王化が進み危ない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - His transformation into the Demon King is progressing and it's dangerous.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・過去、２度リセットのビンタで止めた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - In the past, we stopped him twice with Reset's slap.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・が、今は警戒されてリセットが魔王ランスに近づけない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - But now he is wary and Reset cannot get close to Demon King Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・通常の戦力では魔王ランスに近づけない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - With normal forces, no one can approach Demon King Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・ランスの子、成長した人類最強の我々のみが可能
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - Only us, the children of Rance, the strongest humans grown up, can do it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すでに何度もしている説明だが、ユーザーにも再度理解してもらう為に行う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though this explanation has been given many times, we do it again so the player can understand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シンプルに要点だけでいいです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Keep it simple and just focus on the main points.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リセット、みんなお願い。私がランスにさえ近づく事が出来たら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reset, everyone please. If I can just get close to Rance...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＩＦ深根、いいえ、私がお父様に抱かれる事が出来れば・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: IF Fukane: No, if I can be embraced by Father...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの心を取り戻し、魔王化を抑えるのが目的
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The goal is to recover Rance's heart and suppress his transformation into the Demon King.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザンス、いや、俺は魔王ランスを殺す。息の根を止める
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zansu: No, I will kill Demon King Rance. End his life.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな方法ではまた数年で同じ状況だからな、殺すしかない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That way, after a few years, it'll be the same situation again. There's no choice but to kill him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私達のお父さんよ、いや、それ以前にさすがにそれは無理だわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's our father, you know. No, even before that, that's impossible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王に近づく戦いに持ち込むだけでせいいっぱい、倒すなんて・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just bringing the fight close to the Demon King is all we can manage; defeating him is... impossible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、出来る。俺達はそれだけ強い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, we can. We are that strong.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※ランスを元に戻す、または、殺す事も考えるのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: * Considering whether to restore Rance or kill him...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※子供達の性格によって違うので、それに合わせて書いて下さい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: * Depends on the personality of the children, so please write accordingly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※ある程度、意見が割れている様子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: * Opinions seem somewhat divided.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※　　子供達の気持ちが一致団結してない状況を見せます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: * Showing a situation where the children's feelings are not unified.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 翔竜山の門
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The gate of Mount Shoryu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また門の所に到着します。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We arrive once again at the gate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前回は、ここに来たが門を開ける事が出来なかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Last time, we came here but could not open the gate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、今回は違う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, this time is different.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザスで手に入れた火のオーブ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The fire orb obtained in Lisas.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマンで手に入れた水のオーブ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The water orb obtained in Hellman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスで手に入れた土のオーブ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The earth orb obtained in Zeth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市で手に入れた木のオーブ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The wood orb obtained in the Free City.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＪＡＰＡＮで手に入れた金のオーブ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The gold orb obtained in JAPAN.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長い冒険を経て５つのオーブを集めた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After a long adventure, we gathered five orbs.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これを・・と　門のそばのそれっぽい場所に設置
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Placing them... at an appropriate place near the gate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か音か声か、変化が発生し・・ふわふわと門が消えていった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Some sound or voice occurred... and the gate gently vanished.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おおおお・・すごい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ohhh... amazing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分達は、ここまでやってきたのだ、そして試練をクリアした
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We have come this far, and cleared the trial.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 達成感があり、みんな喜んでいます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is a sense of accomplishment and everyone is happy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 翔竜山を登っていると、臭い匂いがしてくる　腐臭・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While climbing Mount Shoryu, a foul odor approaches — the stench of rot...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふわふわと現れたのは、勇者ゲイマルク。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Floating into view is the hero, Geimark.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前回、ゲイマルクと合っているは、エール、ドッスワッス、長田、ロッキー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Last time, those who met Geimark were Aile, Dosswass, Nagata, and Rocky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だけなので、ほとんどの人は初見です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So most people are seeing him for the first time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ、噂としては聞いています。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, they've heard rumors about him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザンス「あれが死に損ない勇者か、いつまでも勇者の座にしがみつきやがって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zansu: "Is that the half-dead hero? Clinging to his title as hero forever."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本来なら俺がさっさと次の勇者になって魔王と対決出来たはずなのに」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Originally, I should've become the next hero quickly and faced the Demon King."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とか勝手な事をほざかせてもいいかな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe I could let him blurt out such selfish things.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勇者ゲイマルクは、ふらふらしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hero Geimark is staggering.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 半径数メートル以内に近づくと襲ってくるそうだが、近づかずに少し遠回りして進むと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They say if you come within a few meters radius he attacks, but if you keep distance and take a detour,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 問題ない、離れていこうと　するが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there's no problem. We try to leave.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれも倒しておこうと誰かが言う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But someone says let's take him down too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これから魔王と戦うんだ、腐った勇者も倒せるさ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We're about to fight the Demon King; we can surely take down a rotten hero as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールがそれに賛成するか反対するかは選択肢で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whether Aile agrees or disagrees is a choice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が、どっちにしろ戦う事になる流れで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But either way, it leads to a fight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: [Battle]

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 粉々した霧のように消滅させた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was smashed to pieces and vanished like mist.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 母親達は事前に相談しているので知っています
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The mothers know because they consulted in advance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 翔竜山を登っている途中。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the way up Mount Shoryu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レリコフかスシヌが（両方でもいい）実は自分は作戦について詳しく聞いてないと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lerikoff or Sushinu (either is fine) actually says they haven't heard the details of the plan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: という訳で説明する事になる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So it comes down to explaining it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分達の目標は　魔王　を倒す事。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Our goal is to defeat the Demon King.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・そろそろ魔王化が進み危ない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - His transformation into the Demon King is progressing and it's dangerous.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・過去、２度リセットのビンタで止めた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - In the past, we stopped him twice with Reset's slap.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・が、今は警戒されてリセットが魔王ランスに近づけない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - But now he is wary and Reset cannot get close to Demon King Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・通常の戦力では魔王ランスに近づけない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - With normal forces, no one can approach Demon King Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・ランスの子、成長した人類最強の我々のみが可能
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - Only us, the children of Rance, the strongest humans grown up, can do it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すでに何度もしている説明だが、ユーザーにも再度理解してもらう為に行う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though this explanation has been given many times, we do it again so the player can understand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シンプルに要点だけでいいです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Keep it simple and just focus on the main points.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リセット、みんなお願い。私がランスにさえ近づく事が出来たら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reset, everyone please. If I can just get close to Rance...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＩＦ深根、いいえ、私がお父様に抱かれる事が出来れば・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: IF Fukane: No, if I can be embraced by Father...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの心を取り戻し、魔王化を抑えるのが目的
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The goal is to recover Rance's heart and suppress his transformation into the Demon King.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザンス、いや、俺は魔王ランスを殺す。息の根を止める
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zansu: No, I will kill Demon King Rance. End his life.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな方法ではまた数年で同じ状況だからな、殺すしかない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That way, after a few years, it'll be the same situation again. There's no choice but to kill him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私達のお父さんよ、いや、それ以前にさすがにそれは無理だわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's our father, you know. No, even before that, that's impossible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王に近づく戦いに持ち込むだけでせいいっぱい、倒すなんて・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just bringing the fight close to the Demon King is all we can manage; defeating him is... impossible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、出来る。俺達はそれだけ強い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, we can. We are that strong.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※ランスを元に戻す、または、殺す事も考えるのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: * Considering whether to restore Rance or kill him...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※子供達の性格によって違うので、それに合わせて書いて下さい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: * Depends on the personality of the children, so please write accordingly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※ある程度、意見が割れている様子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: * Opinions seem somewhat divided.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※　　子供達の気持ちが一致団結してない状況を見せます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: * Showing a situation where the children's feelings are not unified.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 翔竜山の門
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The gate of Mount Shoryu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また門の所に到着します。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We arrive once again at the gate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前回は、ここに来たが門を開ける事が出来なかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Last time, we came here but could not open the gate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、今回は違う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, this time is different.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザスで手に入れた火のオーブ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The fire orb obtained in Lisas.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマンで手に入れた水のオーブ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The water orb obtained in Hellman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスで手に入れた土のオーブ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The earth orb obtained in Zeth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市で手に入れた木のオーブ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The wood orb obtained in the Free City.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＪＡＰＡＮで手に入れた金のオーブ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The gold orb obtained in JAPAN.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長い冒険を経て５つのオーブを集めた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After a long adventure, we gathered five orbs.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これを・・と　門のそばのそれっぽい場所に設置
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Placing them... at an appropriate place near the gate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か音か声か、変化が発生し・・ふわふわと門が消えていった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Some sound or voice occurred... and the gate gently vanished.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おおおお・・すごい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ohhh... amazing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分達は、ここまでやってきたのだ、そして試練をクリアした
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We have come this far, and cleared the trial.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 達成感があり、みんな喜んでいます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is a sense of accomplishment and everyone is happy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 翔竜山を登っていると、臭い匂いがしてくる　腐臭・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While climbing Mount Shoryu, a foul odor approaches — the stench of rot...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふわふわと現れたのは、勇者ゲイマルク。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Floating into view is the hero, Geimark.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前回、ゲイマルクと合っているは、エール、ドッスワッス、長田、ロッキー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Last time, those who met Geimark were Aile, Dosswass, Nagata, and Rocky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だけなので、ほとんどの人は初見です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So most people are seeing him for the first time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ、噂としては聞いています。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, they've heard rumors about him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザンス「あれが死に損ない勇者か、いつまでも勇者の座にしがみつきやがって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zansu: "Is that the half-dead hero? Clinging to his title as hero forever."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本来なら俺がさっさと次の勇者になって魔王と対決出来たはずなのに」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Originally, I should've become the next hero quickly and faced the Demon King."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とか勝手な事をほざかせてもいいかな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe I could let him blurt out such selfish things.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勇者ゲイマルクは、ふらふらしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hero Geimark is staggering.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 半径数メートル以内に近づくと襲ってくるそうだが、近づかずに少し遠回りして進むと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They say if you come within a few meters radius he attacks, but if you keep distance and take a detour,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 問題ない、離れていこうと　するが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there's no problem. We try to leave.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれも倒しておこうと誰かが言う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But someone says let's take him down too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これから魔王と戦うんだ、腐った勇者も倒せるさ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We're about to fight the Demon King; we can surely take down a rotten hero as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールがそれに賛成するか反対するかは選択肢で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whether Aile agrees or disagrees is a choice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が、どっちにしろ戦う事になる流れで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But either way, it leads to a fight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: [Battle]

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 粉々した霧のように消滅させた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was smashed to pieces and vanished like mist.
